long_description: we can assist with a wide range of mortgages and we have no ties to any lender meaning we can search the whole market and source the best mortgage suited to you. investment purchases or remortgaging your rentals, landlords with one property to large portfolios, we have extensive experience in arranging buy to let mortgages. we offer this specialised service if you're over 55 & want to unlock some of the equity in your home. we have a dedicated in-house team that can look after your mortgage, family, income, and home protection needs. at mortgage select, we have a dedicated buildings & contents insurance specialist who can help look after your home insurance needs. independent mortgage and protection specialists. we offer independent whole of market advice and have no ties to any lender meaning we can search the whole market and source the best deal suited to you. we also have an in-house protection team who can provide you with competitive quotations and arrange life, family, income, buildings & contents insurance cover tailored to your personal requirements.
business_tags: buildings & contents insurance | mortgage servicers | wills & estates planning | lifetime mortgage | mortgage advice | mortgage payments | mortgage application | critical illness cover | home insurance | house building | landlord's insurance | estate plan | re mortgage | moving home | mortgage protection | web designing | website designing | advisor support
generated_description: mortgage select, legally known as mortgage select sw ltd., is a mortgage and protection specialist company based in taunton, england. the company offers independent mortgage advice and services, operating without ties to any specific lenders, allowing them to search the entire market for the best deals. they provide a range of services including mortgages, buy-to-let mortgages, lifetime mortgages, protection plans, wills and estate planning, and buildings and contents insurance. the company is authorized and regulated by the financial conduct authority (fca) and has a dedicated in-house protection team to assist with life, family, income, and home protection needs. mortgage select also specializes in the help to buy scheme and offers services for individuals over 55 looking to unlock equity in their homes.
